name: RG-Borg
description:
Find your memories as an amnesiac cyborg lost in an unfamiliar city. Includes multiple endings! Created for the Minijam 111#, with the theme of Colors and Limitation of "You Are Your Own Enemy". This is our first game created using Twine.

CREDITS

Writer: AFNarratives8
Artist: brygidsoul
Developer: chubitti
